ygData.subject: Darkwood Failure
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Now this is exactly what I have been worried about (I am very very sorry for your loss).  Thank God I didn t try to do this with only a skill of 178, now.
ygData.messageBody:
> Message: 4
> Date: Sat, 02 Oct 1999 13:06:24 -0400
> From: blackhawk@... (Cooper, Mark)
> Subject: Re: Digest Number 30
>
> I WANT TO CRY.. I LVL 182 AND HAVE FAILED 2 TIMES ON
> DARWOOD AND 2 CAM AND SILK AND PLAINING TOOL.
>
> BE WARNED.
>
> BROKE AND BEWILDERED
> KARVAR BLACKHAWK
>
> PS. BLADED NOW TRIVIAL TO ME .. WHAT SHOULDI USE TO IMPROVE MY
> SKILL NOW? IT IS
> THE MOST EXPENSIVE ARROW ITEM AND IT IS TRIVIAL. THE STEEL SHAFT
> DOES NOT SAY
> TRIVIAL BUST 80 TRYS HAS RESULTED IN NO SKILL POINTS. SO I CONFUSED NOW
> PLEASE HELP.

Now this is exactly what I have been worried about (I am very very sorry for
your loss). Thank God I didn't try to do this with only a skill of 178,
now. Bladed tips stopped pushing my skill up at an acceptable rate at level
175 so I added in small nocks and it took me to 178 fairly quickly and then
stopped. My guess is that I'll get a few more points if I add in expensive
fletching or vanes. So here is the caveat. Will anyone actually pay for
the ferrari of bows (2cam + plane+ silk darkwood bow). I do a small but
profitable business in Oak. Is there and actual demand for Darkwood among
the high level players?
